articles.title: South Africans are not xenophobic, Ramaphosa says at launch of vaccine factory - TimesLIVE
articles.description: President Cyril Ramaphosa says South Africans are not xenophobic. As proof, he pointed to the number of academics and students from other African countries studying and working at SA universities.
